meanings.definition: Inflammation of the synovial sheath surrounding a tendon.
meanings.sent1: Tenosynovitises can cause pain and swelling around the tendon.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed her with tenosynovitises in her wrist.

meanings.sent5: The throbbing tenosynovitises made it hard for him to grip anything.
